mapper.select: SELECT r.region_id regionId, r.region_name regionName, c.country_id countryId, c.country_name countryName, l.location_id locationId, l.street_address streetAddress, l.postal_code postalCode, l.city city, l.state_province stateProvince FROM locations l INNER JOIN countries c ON l.country_id = c.country_id INNER JOIN regions r ON c.region_id = r.region_id ORDER BY r.region_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO locations( location_id, street_address, postal_code, city, state_province, country_id ) VALUES( #{locationId}, #{streetAddress}, #{postalCode}, #{city}, #{stateProvince}, #{countryId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE locations SET street_address = #{streetAddress}, postal_code = #{postalCode}, city = #{city}, state_province = #{stateProvince}, country_id = #{countryId} WHERE location_id = #{locationId}
